resources.string: Welcome to the CyberSafety app! Thank you for downloading it! Please click on the menu option to navigate along the application. You have to register into our application to be able to use it.
If you are a returning user, click the log in button.
If you are a new user, please click the register button.
To know about this app and us, please click the bout button.

This application was created as a part of the CyberSafety project by the University of Colorado Boulder CyberSafety Lab. More can be found by going to http://www.cucybersafety.org/. further queries or issues you want to talk to us about? Please email us at: cucybersafety@gmail.com
Add a new Social Network Account
You have # notifications. Want to check them out?
Want to add a new social network profile to monitor?
Want to change your password or phone number?

Here, you can add new social network profiles to monitor for potential cyberbullying instances. Currently we are supporting four social networks, namely Facebook, Instagram, Vine and Ask.fm. You can either search by the email and we will fetch all the social networks attached to that email address or you can select a particular social network and enter the username of the profile. In case of a private social network profile, you have to give us the username and password of that profile in order for you to monitor that profile.
Please wait while we collect your access token from instagram.
